card.name: Anti-Venom, Horrifying Healer
card.property: When Anti-Venom enters, if he was cast, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If damage would be dealt to Anti-Venom, prevent that damage and put that many +1/+1 counters on him.

card.name: Arachne, Psionic Weaver
card.property: Web-slinging {W} (You may cast this spell for {W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.) As Arachne enters, look at an opponent's hand, then choose a card type other than creature. Spells of the chosen type cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Aunt May
card.property: Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. If it's a Spider, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: City Pigeon
card.property: Flying When this creature leaves the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Costume Closet
card.property: This artifact enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from this artifact onto target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery. Whenever a modified creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Daily Bugle Reporters
card.property: When this creature enters, choose one — • Puff Piece — Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. • Investigative Journalism — Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Flash Thompson, Spider-Fan
card.property: Flash When Flash Thompson enters, choose one or both — • Heckle — Tap target creature. • Hero Worship — Untap target creature.

card.name: Friendly Neighborhood
card.property: Enchant land When this Aura enters, create three 1/1 green and white Human Citizen creature tokens. Enchanted land has "{1}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Origin of Spider-Man
card.property: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Create a 2/1 green Spider creature token with reach. II — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It becomes a legendary Spider Hero in addition to its other types. III — Target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Peter Parker
card.property: When Peter Parker enters, create a 2/1 green Spider creature token with reach. {1}{G}{W}{U}: Transform Peter Parker. Activate only as a sorcery.

alternate.name: Amazing Spider-Man
alternate.property: Vigilance, reach Each legendary spell you cast that's one or more colors has web-slinging {G}{W}{U}. (You may cast a spell for its web-slinging cost if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.)

card.name: Rent Is Due
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, you may tap two untapped creatures and/or Treasures you control. If you do, draw a card. Otherwise, sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: Selfless Police Captain
card.property: This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. When this creature leaves the battlefield, put its +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Silver Sable, Mercenary Leader
card.property: When Silver Sable enters, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. Whenever Silver Sable attacks, target modified creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Spectacular Spider-Man
card.property: Flash {1}: Spectacular Spider-Man gains flying until end of turn. {1}, Sacrifice Spectacular Spider-Man: Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Spectacular Tactics
card.property: Choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. • Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Spider-Man, Web-Slinger
card.property: Web-slinging {W} (You may cast this spell for {W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.)

card.name: Spider-UK
card.property: Web-slinging {2}{W} (You may cast this spell for {2}{W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.) At the beginning of your end step, if two or more creatures entered the battlefield under your control this turn, you draw a card and gain 2 life.

card.name: Starling, Aerial Ally
card.property: Flying When Starling enters, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Sudden Strike
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Thwip!
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. If it's a Spider, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Web Up
card.property: When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Web-Shooters
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has reach and "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls." Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Wild Pack Squad
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature gains first strike and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: With Great Power...
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it. All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

card.name: Amazing Acrobatics
card.property: Choose one or both — • Counter target spell. • Tap one or two target creatures.

card.name: Beetle, Legacy Criminal
card.property: Flying {1}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Chameleon, Master of Disguise
card.property: You may have Chameleon enter as a copy of a creature you control, except his name is Chameleon, Master of Disguise. Mayhem {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for {2}{U} if you discarded it this turn. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: The Clone Saga
card.property: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Surveil 3. II — When you next cast a creature spell this turn, copy it, except the copy isn't legendary. III — Choose a card name. Whenever a creature with the chosen name deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Doc Ock, Sinister Scientist
card.property: As long as there are eight or more cards in your graveyard, Doc Ock has base power and toughness 8/8. As long as you control another Villain, Doc Ock has hexproof. (He can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Doc Ock's Henchmen
card.property: Flash Whenever this creature attacks, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Flying Octobot

card.name: Hide on the Ceiling
card.property: Exile X target artifacts and/or creatures. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Hydro-Man, Fluid Felon

card.name: Impostor Syndrome
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of it, except it isn't legendary.

card.name: Lady Octopus, Inspired Inventor
card.property: Whenever you draw your first or second card each turn, put an ingenuity counter on Lady Octopus. {T}: You may cast an artifact spell from your hand with mana value less than or equal to the number of ingenuity counters on Lady Octopus without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Madame Web, Clairvoyant
card.property: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast Spider spells and noncreature spells from the top of your library. Whenever you attack, you may mill a card. (You may put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

card.name: Mysterio, Master of Illusion
card.property: When Mysterio enters, create a 3/3 blue Illusion Villain creature token for each nontoken Villain you control. Exile those tokens when Mysterio leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Gallant Citizen
card.property: When this creature enters, draw a card.

card.name: Green Goblin, Revenant
card.property: Flying, deathtouch Whenever Green Goblin attacks, discard a card. Then draw a card for each card you've discarded this turn.

card.name: Jackal, Genius Geneticist
card.property: Trample Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value equal to Jackal's power, copy that spell, except the copy isn't legendary. Then put a +1/+1 counter on Jackal. (The copy becomes a token.)

card.name: Kraven, Proud Predator
card.property: Vigilance Top of the Food Chain — Kraven's power is equal to the greatest mana value among permanents you control.

card.name: Kraven the Hunter
card.property: Trample Whenever a creature an opponent controls with the greatest power among creatures that player controls dies, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Kraven the Hunter.

card.name: Mary Jane Watson
card.property: Whenever a Spider you control enters, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Mister Negative
card.property: Vigilance, lifelink Darkforce Inversion — When Mister Negative enters, you may exchange life totals with target opponent. If you lose life this way, draw that many cards.

card.name: Mob Lookout

card.property: Whenever you cast a blue spell, if Hydro-Man is a creature, he gets +1/+1 until end of turn. At the beginning of your end step, untap Hydro-Man. Until your next turn, he becomes a land and gains "{T}: Add {U}." (He's not a creature during that time.)

card.name: Impostor Syndrome
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of it, except it isn't legendary.

card.name: Lady Octopus, Inspired Inventor
card.property: Whenever you draw your first or second card each turn, put an ingenuity counter on Lady Octopus. {T}: You may cast an artifact spell from your hand with mana value less than or equal to the number of ingenuity counters on Lady Octopus without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Mysterio, Master of Illusion
card.property: When Mysterio enters, create a 3/3 blue Illusion Villain creature token for each nontoken Villain you control. Exile those tokens when Mysterio leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Spider-Sense
card.property: Web-slinging {U} (You may cast this spell for {U} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.) Counter target instant spell, sorcery spell, or triggered ability.

card.name: Agent Venom
card.property: Flash Menace Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Gwenom, Remorseless
card.property: Deathtouch, lifelink Whenever Gwenom attacks, until end of turn you may look at the top card of your library any time and you may play cards from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.

card.name: Morlun, Devourer of Spiders
card.property: Lifelink Morlun enters with X +1/+1 counters on him. When Morlun enters, he deals X damage to target opponent.

card.name: Parker Luck
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, two target players each reveal the top card of their library. They each lose life equal to the mana value of the card revealed by the other player. Then they each put the card they revealed into their hand.

card.name: Villainous Wrath
card.property: Target opponent loses life equal to the number of creatures they control. Then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Electro, Assaulting Battery
card.property: Flying You don't lose unspent red mana as steps and phases end. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, add {R}. When Electro leaves the battlefield, you may pay {X}. When you do, he deals X damage to target player.

card.name: J. Jonah Jameson
card.property: When J. Jonah Jameson enters, suspect up to one target creature. Whenever a creature you control with menace attacks, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Shadow of the Goblin
card.property: Unreliable Visions — At the beginning of your first main phase, discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Undying Vengeance — Whenever you play a land or cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, this enchantment deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Spider-Verse
card.property: The "legend rule" doesn't apply to Spiders you control. Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may copy it. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Spinneret and Spiderling
card.property: Whenever you attack with two or more Spiders, put a +1/+1 counter on Spinneret and Spiderling. Whenever Spinneret and Spiderling deals 4 or more damage, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Lizard, Connors's Curse
card.property: Trample Lizard Formula — When Lizard, Connors's Curse enters, up to one other target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Lizard creature with base power and toughness 4/4.

card.name: Sandman, Shifting Scoundrel
card.property: Sandman's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Sandman can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. {3}{G}{G}: Return this card and target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Strength of Will
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains indestructible and "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it."

card.name: Web of Life and Destiny
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Biorganic Carapace
Cheering Crowd
card.property: At the beginning of each player's first main phase, that player may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If they do, they add {C} for each counter on it.

card.name: Cosmic Spider-Man

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Flying, first strike, trample, lifelink, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, other Spiders you control gain flying, first strike, trample, lifelink, and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Jackal, Genius Geneticist
card.property: Trample Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value equal to Jackal's power, copy that spell, except the copy isn't legendary. Then put a +1/+1 counter on Jackal. (The copy becomes a token.)

card.name: Kraven the Hunter
card.property: Trample Whenever a creature an opponent controls with the greatest power among creatures that player controls dies, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Kraven the Hunter.

card.name: Mister Negative
card.property: Vigilance, lifelink Darkforce Inversion — When Mister Negative enters, you may exchange life totals with target opponent. If you lose life this way, draw that many cards.

card.name: Superior Spider-Man
card.property: Mind Swap — You may have Superior Spider-Man enter as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard, except his name is Superior Spider-Man and he's a 4/4 Spider Human Hero in addition to his other types. When you do, exile that card.

card.name: Ultimate Green Goblin
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card, then create a Treasure token. Mayhem {2}{B/R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for {2}{B/R} if you discarded it this turn. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: Doc Ock's Tentacles
Interdimensional Web Watch
card.property: When this artifact enters, exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast spells from exile.

card.name: Iron Spider, Stark Upgrade
card.property: Vigilance {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature and/or Vehicle you control. {2}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from among artifacts you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Peter Parker's Camera
card.property: This artifact enters with three film counters on it. {2}, {T}, Remove a film counter from this artifact: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Rocket-Powered Goblin Glider
Oscorp Industries
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters from a graveyard, you lose 2 life. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}. Mayhem (You may play this card from your graveyard if you discarded it this turn. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: Urban Retreat
card.property: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}. {2}, Return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand: Put this card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Spider-Sense
card.property: Web-slinging {U} (You may cast this spell for {U} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.) Counter target instant spell, sorcery spell, or triggered ability.

card.name: Radioactive Spider
card.property: Reach, deathtouch Fateful Bite — {2}, Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a Spider Hero card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Gwenom, Remorseless
card.property: Deathtouch, lifelink Whenever Gwenom attacks, until end of turn you may look at the top card of your library any time and you may play cards from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.
